title: Best of The Herd: 01/08/2021
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 01/08/2021
description:
Colin is worried about Seattle’s offense heading into their Wild Card matchup vs the Rams.  Also, has Josh Allen reached Patrick Mahomes’ status?  Colin gave his Blazin’ 5 picks for the weekend.  Jeff Fisher discussed which teams should be on upset alert this weekend and Mercedes Lewis on Aaron Rodgers quest for another Super Bowl 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
